item.title: Creating The Blog
item.description: Introduction: Like all programmers in the world I decided that my opinions weren’t reaching the right amount of people at work so I decided to create a blog to share my wisdom with the whole world. This isn’t my first foray into making a blog. I have had many attempts at trying to (probably like all programmers) create my own content management system (CMS) and frontend. They all worked to some varying degree but again like all programmers I realised that what seemed like a trivial task at first was actually filled with all sorts of subtle and nuanced problems.

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is a temporary first post
